response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you for this product at $20,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to experience the superior quality and functionality firsthand while securing a piece that could appreciate in value over time. I look forward to discussing the details with you and understanding how this product can enhance your needs and expectations. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 20000}
